text:
Hi All,
Hope anyone could help me with this situation.
I would like to random 2 blog posts, which show the text on the corner ( Watch or Read ).
I create a module in the post template for users to choose the option between Watch or Read
To render 2 random posts I use this function.
Any Idea I can render the choice option?
Thank you.

Hello everyone,

I’m using the new quote template tool and trying to figure out a way to create a custom 404 page for expired quotes. The links/pages to the quote expire when the quote expires, so the links direct customers to the standard 404 page that I have set up. Is there a way to instead direct them to a second custom 404 page that would be for expired quotes? I’m not sure at what point I could intercept the redirect or if it’s even possible in HS.

I’ve opened a <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Dynamic-404-Pages-for-Expired-Quotes/m-p/483858#M46191|question> in the community forum if you want to check it out.

Thanks
